title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.17 - Stable name-restriction on partnership
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4026.17 - Stable name-restriction on partnership

State Regulations
A partnership that, by ownership, designation or
lease, controls the racing qualities of a horse shall race such horse under the
name, real or stable, of a member of the partnership whose proportionate
interest in the horse meets the requirements of section
4025.10
(a) of this

Article, and who has been designated as the managing partner. All horses, the
racing qualities of which are controlled by a given partnership, shall be raced
under the same name. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4026.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
